document_data.name: Dermont
document_data.base: [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|Sevenecho]], [[the Vast]]{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|67-68}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Dermont''' was the name of a prominent family in the [[hamlet]] of [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|Sevenecho]] in [[the Vast]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.History: As one of the more prominent families, the Dermonts contributed a member to the council of elders that governed Sevenecho, around [[1369 DR]].
